title: Square Block Of 10 Perches 500 Meters Away From Nawala Rd. On Senanayake Av. - 2.5 Mn. P.P.
details:
This Block is Situated in the Extreme End Of Senanayaka Av. 700 Meters From Nawala Junction.

Senanayake Av . is a 20 Ft. Wide Access Rd. Immediate Access to Land is a 15 Ft. Wide Rd. Excellent Neighborhood With Calm & Quiet Environment.

Price Quoted above is as indicated by the Owner.
NB: Genuine buyers are encouraged & invited to make reasonable offers after inspection of the Property irrespective of the Price Quoted. Since the Sale will take place at the Best Offer Received.
